data.eml:eml: Milnesium berladnicorum sp. n. (Eutardigrada, Apochela, Milnesiidae), a new species of water bear from Romania

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ciobanu, Daniel Adrian, Zawierucha, Krzysztof, Moglan, Ioan, Kaczmarek, Lukasz (2014): Milnesium berladnicorum sp. n. (Eutardigrada, Apochela, Milnesiidae), a new species of water bear from Romania. ZooKeys 429: 1-11, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.429.7755, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.429.7755
